welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Ramon, Bolivia! Known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage, we hope you enjoy your stay and discover the charm of our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Ramon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Ramon Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Joaquin Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Joaquin Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the 'SJB Airport WiFi' network and entering the provided password.
